titles.title: To amend the Trade Act of 1974 to extend the period of time within which workers may file a petition for trade adjustment assistance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/5/1997--Introduced. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to extend from one year to two years the period of time within which adversely affected workers may file a petition for trade adjustment assistance.
